title: hehe
content: Poway, California.  It's very near San Diego, which is about 2 hours south of Los Angeles.  Our town's motto is "The City in the Country!" which it certainly was up until about 3 years ago, when every vacant lot full of trees and grasses has been turned into housing.  Barf.

title: Spleen Is Here...
content:
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/keenlike/SpleenIsHere.png[/img]

A classy little town known as Lakes Entrance, the only place around here that isn't a complete hole.

[hr]Xky up until about 3 years ago, when every vacant lot full of trees and grasses has been turned into housing. Barf.
[hr]I know what you mean... this place is getting a bit overdeveloped lately. I mean, the town barely has a population of 10,000 and a 5-story apartment complex sprung up over the past year and a half, and there's another 8-story one coming soon! Already New Years Eve is packed... over the next couple of years it's gonna become completely insane.

Someone(s) really got bought out with that one... there was a law that stated a limit of three stories or something, because the land wouldn't be able to handle anything higher.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]

Fortunately I still have two vacant blocks behind my yard so we still have a view... gonna preserve it by setting up a veranda on the back roof of the shed where it's flat... if people value their privacy they won't build there[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] .

Unfortunately, they're probably gonna start developing the [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/keenlike/slands3.jpg[/img] across from my house, which has always been a great view.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"This is how liberty dies--with thunderous applause." -Padme
